text: Mugabo intumwa y’Imana Issa (iii) mugihe yabona amanyama yabo, yaciye avuga ati:- ni bande bazoba abafasha banje bazoshikiriza ubutumwa bw’Imana? Abanyeshuri biwe bavuze bati:- twebwe turi mubafasha b’Imana, kandi twaremeye Imana yacu y’ukuri kandi nube uri icabona yuko twebwe twitanze ku Mana
